titles: A true copy of a letter from divers ministers about Colchester in the county of Essex, to the Assembly of Divines, against a toleration.
notes: Dated at end: From Colchester and the parts adjacent, Febr. 11 1645. Subscribed with Seventy three hands.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
